Instructions

The puzzle grid is partially completed with walls attached to the 16 pillars (+).

The aim is to divide the grid up into a number of isolated areas.

The number and size of the areas is given by the numbers immediateley below the grid.

Tap the grid to add walls and build each area.

Each area MUST contain exactly 2 blue dots.

Each + MUST be connected to at least 2 walls.

This is a UL list:

  • One
  • Two
  • Three

This is an OL list:

  1. One
  2. Two
  3. Three
